Name: JLavoie
AboutMe:
Joel has a passion for technology, business and investment opportunities. As a business manager, entrepreneur and investor, he is always looking for new business opportunities and challenges.

Joel has a (very) technical and scientific background that allows him to work at any level of a technical product development: coding, electronics, network infrastructure, web servers management, etc.

As an entrepreneur and manager, Joel has faced many challenges that made him like the "swiss army knife" of the executive board. He has strong skills in accounting, financial and business planning. Thanks to his various experiences, Joel understands the challenges of today's business realities and he can make quick and smart decisions.
